title: Designing Collaborative Science Learning Environments Using Mobile Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary science curriculum content and understanding of basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Designs science education curricula emphasizing collaborative learning in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Design three or more individualized science learning scenarios using mobile technology.
Develop science learning activity plans using collaborative learning tools (e.g., Google Classroom, KakaoTalk Open Chat).
Exchange feedback with peer teachers using smartphone-based project evaluation tools.

resources: AR app for science education (e.g., Lab4Physics)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
